item.title: ![CDATA[Hang Massive - Once Again - 2011 ( hang drum duo ) ( HD )]]
item.description:
![CDATA[We are on tour! Check out the dates and info: http://hangmassive.co/tour WEBSITE ➤http://hangmassive.com
Download a free track and get regular updates on new music, videos, concerts and special offers: http://hangmassive.co/signup
Check our Bandcamp page for high quality downloads and CD's https://hangmassive.bandcamp.com
THE SOUND OF LIGHT AND COLOUR TOUR 2022 Our next run of live shows will be in Europe starting in October of 2022. The Sound of Light and Colour is the new wave of Hang Massive, a live show and upcoming album that bring together rich electro soundscapes, flowing techno beats and well-loved hand pan classics in a fresh new form.
Tickets and info - http://hangmassive.co/tour
WHERE CAN I BUY AN INSTRUMENT? We are proud to collaborate with the instrument maker Yishama for our new music and new touring live show. Check out their amazing instruments online and discover the magic! https://hangmassive.co/yishama
THIS VIDEO
Enjoy a short Hang Drum duo video filmed on an autumnal morning in the beautiful town of Bath Spa, UK. The instrument played is called a Hang. It is a hand crafted instrument made in Switzerland since the year 2000. The music is by the Hang Massive duo, Danny Cudd and Markus Offbeat.
Thank you for all of the shares and likes and comments on this video. It is an amazing in this current time how we can share our art with so many people around the world regardless of our physical location. In so many ways we become increasingly interconnected with the whole world and we have a shared experience of being human.
SOCIALS Instagram ➤ ( @hangmassive ) http://bit.ly/instaHangMassive Facebook ➤ http://facebook.com/hangmassive
For booking and licensing inquiries - contact@hangmassive.com
The music of Hang Massive is sourced in the teachings of Short Moments, a global grass-roots organisation for human empowerment and social change. Both Danny and Markus have been students of Short Moments and the founder, Ziji Rinpoche for many years. Ziji Rinpoche is a formal lineage holder of the Nyingma Dzogchen lineage. Root teachers are H.H. Minling Trichen Rinpoche and Venerable Wangdor Rinpoche. https://www.shortmoments.com/about
© Copyright 2018 Hang Massive]]

item.title: ![CDATA[Beirut: NPR Music Tiny Desk Concert]]
item.description:
![CDATA[Beirut arrived at the NPR Music offices dusty and exhausted following a weekend at Bonnaroo in Tennessee. But after some much-needed showers, the band brought infectious joy to its short set behind the Tiny Desk.
Set List: "East Harlem" "Sante Fe" "Serbian Cocek"
For more videos and to subscribe to the Tiny Desk Concerts podcast, visit npr.org/tinydeskconcerts.]]
